title: A timeline of coronavirus testing in the US - The Washington Post
description: A timeline of coronavirus testing in the US The Washington Post CDC chief warns 'it's important not to let up at all' as parts of the U.S. seek to reopen NBCNews.com Contamination at CDC lab delayed rollout of coronavirus tests The Washington Post View Full C…
content:
Reports of a respiratory virus spreading in Wuhan, China, emerged in late 2019. After the number of cases outside China increased rapidly, the World Health Organization declared the novel coronavirus a pandemic on March 11.
With no cure or vaccine currently … [+12859 chars]
